data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Liu, Mengmeng, Li, Zejian, Wei, Meicai (2019): Three new species of Macrophya Dahlbom (Hymenoptera, Tenthredinidae) with a key to species of the Macrophya imitator group in China. Zoosystematics and Evolution 95 (2): 417-427, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zse.95.35594, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zse.95.35594
